description: Reed Farrington joins us to review Dawn of the Planet of the Apes and discuss the Predator reboot, plus we also talk They Came Together, Under the Skin, Visitors, Resurrected, The Freshman, Turtle Power, Passion and Extant.

title: Bonus Podcast: Movie Organization Manifesto, Part 4
description: Just when you thought there was nothing left to say about organizing a movie collection, we tackle a variety of new topics including the general and special theory of collectivity, Letterboxd usage, conserving space and making the move to digital, plus we answer many more listener questions.

title: Episode 472: Transformers: Age of Extinction
description: Special guest Matt Gourley joins the VibeCast crew to review Transformers: Age of Extinction and to play a new trivia game called Score Bits!

title: Episode 471: Willow Creek
description: We get lost in the woods with Willow Creek and discuss Rian Johnson directing Star Wars: Episode VIII plus we also talk Harry and the Hendersons, The Grand Budapest Hotel, Speed 1 and 2, The Wedding Singer, Ravenous, Wrong Cops, Antiviral and Game of Thrones Season 4.

title: Episode 470: 22 Jump Street and How to Train Your Dragon 2
description: We review 22 Jump Street and How to Train Your Dragon 2, plus we also discuss the first trailer for Dumb and Dumber To, Hercules, Tim's Vermeer, Aguirre: The Wrath of God and The Sweet Smell of Success.

title: Episode 469: Edge of Tomorrow
description: We get thrown for a loop by Edge of Tomorrow and discuss Blended, Maleficent, Nosferatu The Vampyre, The Big Heat, Death Wish and Sorcerer plus we also hold the first ever VibeCast Film Junk Trivia Off.

title: Episode 468: A Million Ways to Die in the West
description: We fail to get slayed by A Million Ways to Die in the West and discuss the Stargate reboot, plus we also talk Rain Man, The Lone Ranger, Fighting Mad, Sucker Punch, Stoker and Jim Henson's Creature Shop Challenge.

title: Episode 467: X-Men: Days of Future Past
description: The VIBEcast returns as Dax and Reed help us review X-Men: Days of Future Past and discuss Edgar Wright leaving Ant-Man plus we also talk 47 Ronin, Thunderbirds are GO, Road House, The Adjustment Bureau and The King of Comedy.

title: Episode 466: Godzilla
description: We go toe-to-toe with Godzilla and discuss the new Interstellar trailer plus we also talk Monsters, Blue Caprice, Halt and Catch Fire, and Jay confronts Frank about Coffee Gate.

title: Episode 465: Neighbors
description: We party with Neighbors and dissect the new Batsuit plus we also talk Orpheus, Blazing Saddles, The Five-Year Engagement, Gammera the Invincible and Wild at Heart.

title: Bonus Podcast: Hot Docs 2014
description: We dive into a whole heap of non-fiction films from Hot Docs including Harmontown, Super Duper Alice Cooper, An Honest Liar, Kung Fu Elliot, Giuseppe Makes a Movie, Art and Craft, Actress, American Interior, Rich Hill and Whitey: United States of America v. James J. Bulger.

title: Episode 464: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
description: We get bitten by The Amazing Spider-Man 2 and discuss the Star Wars Day announcements plus we also talk The Sacrament, Double Indemnity, Detour, Infernal Affairs, No Holds Barred and the Fargo TV series.

title: Episode 463: Transcendence and Enemy
description: We take Transcendence offline and try to make sense of Enemy plus we also discuss the Boyhood trailer, The Hobbit title change, The Lawnmower Man, The Swimmer, Jack and Jill, The Final Member and Anchorman 2: Super-Sized R-Rated Version.

title: Episode 462: Joe and Snowpiercer
description: We get to know Joe and offer an early review of Snowpiercer plus we also discuss the first trailer for Gone Girl, the possibility of VR movies, Draft Day, The Unknown Known, Grudge Match, The Conspiracy, Silicon Valley and Little House on the Prairie.

title: Episode 461: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
description: We infiltrate Captain America: The Winter Soldier and discuss new trailers for The Expendables 3 and Lucy plus we also talk Captain America (1990), Colossus: The Forbin Project and the Girls Season 3 finale.

title: The Movie Review Show #9: June 23rd 1991 - Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
description: From the Film Junk vault comes a lost episode of the earliest incarnation of the show, recently discovered on cassette tape. Childhood friends Sean, Jay and Frank review Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves plus they also discuss The Rocketeer, What About Bob and Young Guns II plus new trailers for Problem Child 2 and Terminator 2: Judgment Day.

title: Episode 460: Noah and The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: We kneel before Noah and nitpick the symmetry of The Grand Budapest Hotel plus we also discuss the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles trailer along with Paranormal Activity: The Marked Ones, The Last Temptation of Christ, Grand Piano, Seven, Dogs, Capturing the Friedmans and The Pink Panther.

title: Episode 459: Muppets Most Wanted
description: We turn out the lights on Muppets Most Wanted and debate some Ghostbusters 3 news plus we also discuss Life Itself, Showgirls, Nothing But Trouble and Gravity.

title: Episode 458: Cheap Thrills and Nymphomaniac Vol. 2
description: We party with Cheap Thrills and get abused by Nymphomaniac Vol. 2 plus we also assess the current state of 3D cinema and discuss Smash and Grab: The Story of the Pink Panthers, The Verdict, Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion, Fletch, Nathan for You and House of Cards Season 2.

title: Episode 457: Nymphomaniac Vol. 1 and True Detective
description: We get turned on by Nymphomaniac Vol. 1 and investigate the first season of True Detective plus we also discuss the Oscar winners and Delivery Man, The Summit, The Silence of the Lambs, Who's Harry Crumb, The Shadow and Insignificance.

title: Episode 456: Non-Stop
description: In our annual pre-Oscar podcast, we review Non-Stop and discuss Only Lovers Left Alive, August: Osage County, 3 Days to Kill, Night and the City and The Broken Circle Breakdown plus we also offer up a few uneducated Oscar predictions.

title: Episode 455: The Lego Movie
description: We deconstruct The Lego Movie and take a trip to Westworld plus we also discuss the Guardians of the Galaxy trailer, Flesh + Blood, MacGruber, Bringing Out the Dead and The Short Game.

title: Episode 454: Robocop
description: We disassemble the Robocop remake and discuss the new TMNT designs plus Hollow Man, Soldier of Orange, Cutie and the Boxer, The Hunt, Almost Human and Deceptive Practice: The Mysteries and Mentors of Ricky Jay.

title: Episode 453: The Monuments Men
description: We avoid getting drafted by The Monuments Men and revisit Honey I Shrunk The Kids, plus we also discuss the on-going Woody Allen scandal, The Dirty Dozen, Where Eagles Dare, Man of Steel and Rififi.

title: Episode 452: Labor Day and Big Bad Wolves
description: We learn to bake with Labor Day and Big Bad Wolves and we talk Jesse Eisenberg as Lex Luthor, plus we also discuss Metallica: Through the Never, The Family, In a World, Owning Mahowny, Unholy Rollers, Goodfellas and The Master.

title: Episode 451: Riddick
description: We review Riddick and debate Tarantino's The Hateful Eight script leak, plus we also discuss The Square, An Adventure in Space and Time, The Pagemaster and Community Season 5.

title: Episode 450: Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
description: We get geopolitical with Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit and react to the 2014 Oscar nominations plus we also discuss the previous Jack Ryan films, Short Term 12 and True Detective.

title: Episode 449: Lone Survivor and The Dirties
description: We get caught in the crossfire with Lone Survivor and The Dirties plus we also discuss our most anticipated movies of the year along with The Secret Life of Walter Mitty, The Seven-Per-Cent Solution, The Parallax View and Seconds.

title: Episode 448: Inside Llewyn Davis and Best of 2013
description: We croon over the Coen Brothers' Inside Llewyn Davis and count down our best and worst movies of 2013.

title: Back Episodes Available on Gumroad
description: Back episodes can be purchased in yearly bundles at http://gumroad.com/filmjunk.
